title: Prepare Return with Gambling Winnings
description: A taxpayer received a Form W-2G for significant gambling winnings.

tasks.description: Enter the gambling winnings from Form W-2G as 'Other Income' on Schedule 1.
Gather information on the taxpayer's gambling losses for the year.
Deduct the gambling losses on Schedule A, up to the amount of the winnings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly claims the gambling loss deduction, offsetting the winnings.
